statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.AttributeTypeID , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
, BB.Name as AttributeTypeName
FROM dbo.TAttribute AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TAttributeType BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AttributeTypeID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.AttributeTypeID = #AttributeTypeID# )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TAttribute AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TAttribute ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, AttributeTypeID, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #AttributeTypeID#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TAttribute SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , AttributeTypeID = #AttributeTypeID# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
